name: Bats
description:
All the mice on earth went to the moon because they thought it was made of cheese. The only thing the mice found on the moon was an dust ...

When the cats realized their food went to the moon, they went to get them back. Unfortunately, they crash landed on the moon. Now you need to find Materials and Fuel to get back to earth, but the mice have same idea. Now you must use droids to fight for territories and get resources before the mice do. The fight to get Down to Earth is on…..

(Not finished but is working as a concept. ☹ )
